metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2146 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The am_read_post_data function in mod_auth_mellon before 0.11.1 does not limit the amount of data read, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (worker process crash, web server deadlock, or memory consumption) via a large amount of POST data.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2146` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-auth-mellon - 0.12.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-mellon package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12.0-1').
